title: Get Off The Dependency Train
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The ratio of working-age population to the level of retirees continues to shrink and is on track to reach just two workers for every retiree by 2050. Just like oil economies that can't wean themselves away from the volatile commodity, or consumers who buy gas guzzlers when oil is cheap, the prison of economic dependency is hard to break away from. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
